DEFAULT_IGNORE_TAG_STRINGS

public static final java.lang.String[] DEFAULT_IGNORE_TAG_STRINGS
Default tags (whose text) to ignore in the tree.

DEFAULT_IGNORE_TAGS

public static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> DEFAULT_IGNORE_TAGS

DEFAULT_IGNORE_TAG_ATTRIBUTES

public static final java.lang.String[] DEFAULT_IGNORE_TAG_ATTRIBUTES
Default tag names whose attributes should be ignored when creating a key to match tags. All other tag attributes will be included in generating a key.

DEFAULT_HEADING_TAGS

public static final java.lang.String[] DEFAULT_HEADING_TAGS
Any text found under these tags are considered headings.

VALUE_TO_STRENGTH

public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> VALUE_TO_STRENGTH
Default mappings from heading values to heading 'strength':

h h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6

size-N 6 5 4 3 2 1 0

size-% 200 150 120 100 80 70 60

hr thead th

em

strong

b

title strength 7 6 5 4 0 3 2 1
